Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra | codename = | logo = | logosize = | image = | imagesize = | alt = | caption = | brand = [[Samsung Galaxy]] | manufacturer = [[Samsung Electronics]] | slogan = | colors = | series = [[Samsung Galaxy S series]] | modelnumber = | networks = | released = | available = | discontinued = | unitssold = | unitsshipped = | predecessor = [[Samsung Galaxy S23]] | successor = | related = | type = [[Smartphone]] | form = [[Slate phone|Slate]] | size = | weight = | os = [[Android 14]] | soc = | cpu = | gpu = | modem = | memory = | storage = | memory_card = | sim = | battery = | charging = | input = | display = | ext_display = | rear_camera = | front_camera = | sound = | connectivity = | water_resist = | other = | sar = | hac = | website = | references = }} The '''Samsung Galaxy S24''' is going to be a series of [[Android (operating system)|Android]]-based [[smartphone]]s designed, developed, manufactured, and marketed by [[Samsung Electronics]] as part of its [[Samsung Galaxy S series|Galaxy S series]]. == References == {{Reflist}} {{S-start}} {{S-bef| before = [[Samsung Galaxy S23]]}} {{S-ttl| title = Samsung Galaxy S24| years = 2024}} {{S-inc| recent}} {{S-end}} {{Samsung phones}} {{Samsung Galaxy S|smartphones=yes|tablets =yes}} {{Draft categories| [[Category:Android (operating system) devices]] [[Category:Samsung mobile phones]] [[Category:Samsung Galaxy]] [[Category:Smartphones]] [[Category:Phablets]] [[Category:Flagship smartphones]] [[Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras]] [[Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording]] [[Category:Mobile phones with 8K video recording]] }}
